author: RTÉ News
title: Trump warns of 'very horrendous' number of virus deaths
description: President Donald Trump has warned Americans to brace for a "very horrendous" number of coronavirus deaths in the coming days.
content:
US President Donald Trump has warned Americans to brace for a "very horrendous" number of coronavirus deaths in the coming days.
The number of confirmed COovid-19 cases in the United States has surpassed 300,000. 
More than 8,300 people with the infection h… [+2529 chars]
